name: Chemplant Engineering
overview:
Chemplant & Engineering Services came into formation in the year 1997 as a partnership firm. Our manufacturing plant and are business activities are efficiently carried from Kolkata, West Bengal, India. We have enormous experience of manufacturing, exporting and supplying of Pressure Vessel, Pressure Vessel, Distillation Columns, Healthcare Units and many more.

Our Infrastructure: Our organization has all aid and amenities which are essential in making of complete-state-of-the-art organization. Segregated into different small units, we are apt in making use of technological developments. We have done our homework well in garnering hi tech instruments which help is production process; these machines are maintained well and get replenished before they are categorized obsolete.

Our Quality: Our organization is quality striven and so are our manufactured equipments. We have been ceaselessly been working to manufacture machines which help the clients and also get massive appreciation for their performance and functionality.

Our Clients: Sree Felts Pvt Ltd – Kolkata Lords Chemical Ltd – Kolkata Vaishnavi Healthcare – Baddi, HP Poddar Group - Kolkata Tata Pigments Ltd, Jamshedpur Colgate Palmolive Ltd – Nepal Allied Products - Kolkata Sadhana Aushadhalaya – Kolkata

Why Us?: Customization provision Qualified and professional team Upgraded production unit Full-proof packaging Wide range
